    index="quantized-image-index",
    knn={
        "field": "image-vector",
        "query_vector": [
            0.1,
            -2
        ],
        "k": 15,
        "num_candidates": 100
    },
    fields=[
        "title"
    ],
    rescore={
        "window_size": 10,
        "query": {
            "rescore_query": {
                "script_score": {
                    "query": {
                        "match_all": {}
                    },
                    "script": {
                        "source": "cosineSimilarity(params.query_vector, 'image-vector') + 1.0",

                                0.1,
                                -2
